myPosts.title: How to prevent wandering?
myPosts.message: Hi everyone. My mother's Alzheimer's conditions has steadily getting worse especially wandering. With a blink of an eye she is gone. She is constantly leaving the house and sometimes it can take me hours to find her. What should I do?

repliesMsg.name: Rachel
repliesMsg.theirMsg: Hi Tom! Currently, my father is in his last stage of Alzheimer's. I have learned that the best way to approach the situtaion is...
